text: A lot of times, its the attention to detail that counts. Celebrated birthday here and was surprised with a personalized card with our photo sticked to it. The staff are also very attentive and always ready to help specially Lennie. They offer different cuisine - but choices are not overwhelming. The food is always replenished. Overall it was a great experience! Will recommend!

We had hosted an early Mother’s Day and birthday celebration for our mother at FernTree. It was an amazing experience as always and the staff members made sure the dinner was special for her with an extra celebration. They also prepared a photo for her as memory for the day. Thank you so much for making the day special for our little celebration! :)

Had a wonderful dining experience at Ferntree Café at Miramar Hotel Singapore! The food was delicious, fresh, and beautifully presented—especially the local dishes that were full of authentic flavor. What made the experience truly memorable was the excellent service. A special shoutout to Mr. Philip Chew, who went above and beyond to make sure we were well taken care of. His warmth, attentiveness, and genuine hospitality really stood out. Highly recommended for anyone looking for great food and top-notch service in a cozy, welcoming setting! Thank you for the free birthday cake

Had an amazing experience in this restaurant. We came here for our anniversary dinner. The food selection was incredible, with a variety of dishes. But the real highlight for me was the dessert section. The choices were endless, from creamy cheesecakes to delicate pastries and ice creams. If you’re a seafood lover or have a sweet tooth, this place is a must-visit!
Please do not forget to reserve via eatigo because you get 50% offer.

We came here for a buffet lunch to celebrate a birthday, and we had a great experience! Atmosphere is good, food tasted good, but there's still room for improvement. However, the service was top-notch! The staff were very attentive, plates were cleared fast. Thanks to Philip and the team for their excellent service and the delicious birthday cake was a lovely surprise that made this occasion truly memorable. We left with full bellies and big smiles!
